meta.name: Ehsan Pourhadi Knowledge Graph
meta.description: Canonical schema for portfolio, work, products, roles, skills, tools, and certifications.

Person.description: A human actor. Currently only one: the portfolio owner.

Work.description: A concrete system, platform, or deliverable that was built or shipped.

Product.description: An owned, repeatable artifact that can evolve independently of a single engagement.

Role.description: A mode of contribution or responsibility.

Skill.description: A transferable capability independent of specific tools.

properties.name: string
properties.category: enum [frontend, backend, data, design, cloud, devops, leadership, multimedia]

Tool.description: A concrete technology, framework, or platform.

properties.name: string
properties.type: enum [language, framework, library, database, platform, service]

Certification.description: A formal external validation of knowledge or skill.

Service.description: A professional service or offering provided by the person.

TimeSpan.description: A temporal window used for slicing or grouping activity.

PERFORMED.description: Person performed or contributed to a work.

DELIVERED_FOR.description: Work was delivered for an organization.

ACTED_AS.description: Person acted in a given role.

APPLIED_IN.description: Role was applied in a specific work.

SUPPORTED_BY.description: Skill is supported or enabled by a tool.

DURING.description: Work occurred during a time span.
